::Prowl/Dark One/Pyro/Nemesis Enforcer/Reptilica::

Prowl walked down toward the base with Dinobot, activating his cloaking 
device and silencer. This was going to be very suicidal, both of them 
probably knew that. His eyes narrow as he sees Reptilica aproach the entrance.

"We'll go in after him," Prowl says into his silencer, silently edging toward 
the left side of the door.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Reptilica stops. Something was not right, he could feel it. He looks around, 
not seeing anything.

He shruggs. Must be just stress. Or that punch from Perndabot. Reptilica 
turns back to the door, walking forward, the door opening for him.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl carefully enters behind Reptilica, pressing himself against the left 
wall.

"Once we're in, we take the hallway to the brig. After the last few attempts 
to rescue them, they'd be expecting us to waltz in and ask for Iron Raptor 
and Tav back," he says into his silencer, now completely inside the base, 
"When we reach the brig, we need to knock out the guards before they sound 
the alarm. Any weapon fire will instanly alert the scanners, and we'd have a 
mess on our hands."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Dark One laughs harshly as Iron Raptor tells Tavatron not to scream.

"Don't worry, femm," he says, pushing her into the wall, energon beams coming 
up to restrain her, "She'll scream."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Pyro finishes strapping Tavatron to the table, looking at Dark One as he 
hears him laugh.

"Where's Nemesis?" he asks, "We need him for the torture."

"Out the door, slaggin' a Maximal," Dark One replies, "Go relieve him."

"But I'll miss this!"

Dark One growls, "You want to be on there instead of her," he asks, pointing 
to Tavatron.

Pyro steps back, "On second thought, I think I'll slag some Maxi's."

With that, he walks out of the door. Several seconds later Nemesis Enforcer 
enters. He laughs evilly as he looks at Tavatron.

"I think I'll try an invention of mine here....." he pauses for impact, "The 
Pain Bug!"

Nemesis walks over to a storage bin, looking inside it. He frowns.

"Its here somewhere," he says, rummaging through the devices in the bin.
